definition: to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: Another's bedroom is tilting.There are cracks on many of the walls.
sentences.chinese: 另一间卧室也已倾斜，墙壁上尽是裂隙。

sentences.english: A fissure is a linear cleft through the epidermis, or into the dermis.
sentences.chinese: 裂隙是穿过表皮或深达真皮的线状损害。

sentences.english: Finally both the flea and fly managed to flee through a flaw in the flue。
sentences.chinese: 最后，两个都设法通过那管子的一个裂隙逃走了。

sentences.english: It is more serious implication that fracture water is rich in the wall-rock during tunnel's construction and operation.
sentences.chinese: 围岩富集裂隙水对隧道施工和运营有着较严重的影响。

sentences.english: A man stands atop a fissured road.
sentences.chinese: 一名男子站在出现裂隙的道路上。

sentences.english: The resulting fracture distribution is fully coincide with gas-producing formations which are confirmed by drilling.
sentences.chinese: 预测的裂隙分布情况与实际钻井产气结果一致。

sentences.english: It can also be used to observe the corneal curvature under the slit-lamp microscope.
sentences.chinese: 也可在裂隙灯显微镜下观察角膜曲度。

sentences.english: Wider cracks tend to appear on the back of thick veneers peeled from southern type poplar.
sentences.chinese: 利用意杨旋切厚单板易使单板背面裂隙度增大。

sentences.english: A wide crack that accomodates (most of) the body of the climber.
sentences.chinese: 一种大的裂隙，宽度可容纳攀岩者的身体。

sentences.english: Epi-Fissure-Karst Zone(EFKZ)is commonly observed in karst mountainous area at the middle latitude of P.
sentences.chinese: 表层裂隙岩溶带广泛分布于我国中纬度岩溶地区。

sentences.english: Main Outcome Measures Slit-lamp microscopic images of corneal dystrophy and graft.
sentences.chinese: 主要指标角膜病变及角膜移植片的裂隙灯显微镜图像。

sentences.english: Micro-cracks of rocks is closely related to in situ velocity variation.
sentences.chinese: 岩石微裂隙与主孔原位波速变化有密切关系。

sentences.english: All patients were followed-up for 16 weeks and were examined with slit-lamp and fluorescein staining.
sentences.chinese: 术后裂隙灯及荧光素染色检查，平均随访16周。

sentences.english: As Sideswipe, get through the whole chasm using less than 6 grapples.
sentences.chinese: 操作横炮，在只用不到6次抓钩的情况下穿越裂隙。

sentences.english: Gold minerals among grains are principal in the enchasing status, the others exist in enclosure and fracture.
sentences.chinese: 嵌布状态以粒间金为主，其次是包裹金和裂隙金。

sentences.english: Theclinical manifestation showed the cyclic bending and fissure of the hair.
sentences.chinese: 临床表现为周期性毛发折曲和裂隙。

definition: variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
